Package be.fedict.eid.applet.service.signer.facets

This package contains implementation classes for various signature facets.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RevocationDataService Interface for a service that retrieves revocation data about some given certificate chain.
SignaturePolicyService Interface for the signature policy service.
 

Class Summary
CoSignatureFacet Signature facet to create multiple independent signatures, a.k.a co-signatures.
EnvelopedSignatureFacet Signature Facet implementation to create enveloped signatures.
ExplicitSignaturePolicyService Explicit signature policy service implementation.
IdentitySignatureFacet Signature Facet implementation doing an eID identity ds:Object.
KeyInfoSignatureFacet Signature Facet implementation that adds ds:KeyInfo to the XML signature.
RevocationData Container class for PKI revocation data.
XAdESNamespacePrefixMapper JAXB RI namespace prefix mapper for XAdES.
XAdESSignatureFacet XAdES Signature Facet.
XAdESXLSignatureFacet XAdES-X-L v1.4.1 signature facet.
 

Package be.fedict.eid.applet.service.signer.facets Description

This package contains implementation classes for various signature facets.
